Attributes.description: Neurobiological pathways mediating five core aspects of motivated behaviour: (1) affective decision making; (2) motivated drive; (3) goal-directed vs. habit-based behaviour; (4) learning from negative reinforcers; and (5) disorders of motivation.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: B313
